thread.title: Awareness of breast cancer

author: JERRI MILLS Contributing Writer
title: Awareness of breast cancer
text:
Awareness of breast cancer By JERRI MILLS Contributing Writer The Daily Sentinel | 0 comments 
October is Breast Cancer Awareness Month. It is not your imagination — pink is all around us, and this is because pink is a feminine color often associated with women. Breast cancer is associated with women but not limited to women.
